targets.target: match(n:CI:JENKINS:DATA)  where n.inSightsTime>(timestamp()/1000)-1*86400 AND n.jobName IN ["Build_Deploy_PCF_Dev", "Build_Deploy_PCF_QA", "API_Build_Deploy_PCF_QA" ,"Build_Deploy_PCF_Stage"]   return count(distinct n.buildUrl) as Last24Hrs

match(n:CI:JENKINS:DATA)  where n.inSightsTime>(timestamp()/1000)-7*86400 AND n.jobName IN ["Build_Deploy_PCF_Dev", "Build_Deploy_PCF_QA", "API_Build_Deploy_PCF_QA" ,"Build_Deploy_PCF_Stage"] return count(distinct n.buildUrl) as Last7Days

match(n:CI:JENKINS:DATA)  where n.inSightsTime>(timestamp()/1000)-30*86400 AND n.jobName IN ["Build_Deploy_PCF_Dev", "Build_Deploy_PCF_QA", "API_Build_Deploy_PCF_QA" ,"Build_Deploy_PCF_Stage"] return count(distinct n.buildUrl) as Last30Days

match(n:CI:JENKINS:DATA)  where n.jobName IN ["Build_Deploy_PCF_Dev", "Build_Deploy_PCF_QA", "API_Build_Deploy_PCF_QA" ,"Build_Deploy_PCF_Stage"] and (tofloat(n.inSightsTime)>=?START_TIME? AND tofloat(n.inSightsTime)<=?END_TIME?)   return split(n.inSightsTimeX,'T')[0] as inSightsTime,count(distinct n.buildUrl) as Count order by inSightsTime

match(m:CI:JENKINS:DATA) where exists(m.result)   and m.jobName IN ["CI_API_Pronto", "CI_API_PreSpec", "CI_API_RSpec"] AND (tofloat(m.inSightsTime)>=?START_TIME? AND tofloat(m.inSightsTime)<=?END_TIME?) 
with m,
CASE WHEN m.result="SUCCESS"
THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as success,
CASE 
WHEN m.result="FAILURE" OR m.result="UNSTABLE" 
THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as failure
return split(m.inSightsTimeX,'T')[0] as inSightsTime,sum(success) as Success, sum(failure) as Failure  order by inSightsTime asc

MATCH (n:CI:JENKINS:DATA) where n.jobName in ["CI_API_Pronto", "CI_API_PreSpec", "CI_API_RSpec"] AND (n.result="UNSTABLE" OR n.result="FAILURE" )  AND  tofloat(n.inSightsTime)>=?START_TIME? AND tofloat(n.inSightsTime)<=?END_TIME?  return count(n) as Failures

MATCH (n:JENKINS:DATA) where n.jobName in ["CI_API_Pronto", "CI_API_PreSpec", "CI_API_RSpec"] AND (n.result="UNSTABLE" OR n.result="FAILURE" )  AND  tofloat(n.inSightsTime)>=?START_TIME? AND tofloat(n.inSightsTime)<=?END_TIME?  return count (distinct n.buildUrl) as StaticCodeErrors

match(m:CI:JENKINS:DATA) where exists(m.result) AND m.jobName IN ["Build_Deploy_PCF_Dev", "Build_Deploy_PCF_QA", "API_Build_Deploy_PCF_QA" ,"Build_Deploy_PCF_Stage"] AND  (m.result="FAILURE" OR m.result="UNSTABLE") AND (tofloat(m.inSightsTime)>=?START_TIME? AND tofloat(m.inSightsTime)<=?END_TIME?) return count(m) as Failed

MATCH(n:CI:JENKINS:DATA) where n.jobName in ["Build_Deploy_PCF_Dev", "Build_Deploy_PCF_QA", "API_Build_Deploy_PCF_QA" ,"Build_Deploy_PCF_Stage"] AND  tofloat(n.inSightsTime)>=?START_TIME? AND tofloat(n.inSightsTime)<=?END_TIME? return ceil(avg(toInt(n.duration/1000))) as AvgTime

panels.title: Time to Package API Build(in secs)

targets.target:
match(m:CI:JENKINS:DATA) where m.jobName IN ["Build_Deploy_PCF_Dev", "Build_Deploy_PCF_QA", "API_Build_Deploy_PCF_QA" ,"Build_Deploy_PCF_Stage"] AND (tofloat(m.inSightsTime)>=?START_TIME? AND tofloat(m.inSightsTime)<=?END_TIME?)
with m,
CASE WHEN m.jobName="Build_Deploy_PCF_Dev"
THEN m.duration ELSE 0 END as Build_Deploy_PCF_Dev,
CASE 
WHEN m.jobName="Build_Deploy_PCF_QA"
THEN m.duration ELSE 0 END as Build_Deploy_PCF_QA,
CASE 
WHEN m.jobName="API_Build_Deploy_PCF_QA"
THEN m.duration ELSE 0 END as API_Build_Deploy_PCF_QA,
CASE 
WHEN m.jobName="Build_Deploy_PCF_Stage"
THEN m.duration ELSE 0 END as Build_Deploy_PCF_Stage
return split(m.inSightsTimeX,'T')[0] as inSightsTime,ceil(avg(toInt(Build_Deploy_PCF_Dev/1000))) as Build_Deploy_PCF_Dev,ceil(avg(toInt(Build_Deploy_PCF_QA/1000))) as Build_Deploy_PCF_QA,ceil(avg(toInt(API_Build_Deploy_PCF_QA/1000))) as API_Build_Deploy_PCF_QA,ceil(avg(toInt(Build_Deploy_PCF_Stage/1000))) as Build_Deploy_PCF_Stage order by inSightsTime

MATCH(n:CI:JENKINS:DATA) where n.jobName in ["DB_Build_Dev", "DB_Deployment_Dev", "DB_Build_QA", "DB_Deployment_QA", "DB_Build_Stage", "DB_Deployment_Stage"] AND  tofloat(n.inSightsTime)>=?START_TIME? AND tofloat(n.inSightsTime)<=?END_TIME? return ceil(avg(toInt(n.duration/1000))) as AvgTime

panels.title: Time Taken To Build DB Scripts(in secs)

targets.target:
match(m:CI:JENKINS:DATA) where m.jobName IN ["DB_Build_Dev", "DB_Deployment_Dev", "DB_Build_QA", "DB_Deployment_QA", "DB_Build_Stage", "DB_Deployment_Stage"] AND (tofloat(m.inSightsTime)>=?START_TIME? AND tofloat(m.inSightsTime)<=?END_TIME?)
with m,
CASE WHEN m.jobName="DB_Build_Dev"
THEN m.duration ELSE 0 END as DB_Build_Dev,
CASE WHEN m.jobName="DB_Deployment_Dev"
THEN m.duration ELSE 0 END as DB_Deployment_Dev,
CASE WHEN m.jobName="DB_Build_QA"
THEN m.duration ELSE 0 END as DB_Build_QA,
CASE WHEN m.jobName="DB_Deployment_QA"
THEN m.duration ELSE 0 END as DB_Deployment_QA,
CASE WHEN m.jobName="DB_Build_Stage"
THEN m.duration ELSE 0 END as DB_Build_Stage,
CASE WHEN m.jobName="DB_Deployment_Stage"
THEN m.duration ELSE 0 END as DB_Deployment_Stage
return split(m.inSightsTimeX,'T')[0] as inSightsTime,ceil(avg(toInt(DB_Build_Dev/1000))) as DB_Build_Dev,ceil(avg(toInt(DB_Deployment_Dev/1000))) as DB_Deployment_Dev,ceil(avg(toInt(DB_Build_QA/1000))) as DB_Build_QA,ceil(avg(toInt(DB_Deployment_QA/1000))) as DB_Deployment_QA,ceil(avg(toInt(DB_Build_Stage/1000))) as DB_Build_Stage,ceil(avg(toInt(DB_Deployment_Stage/1000))) as DB_Deployment_Stage

panels.title: DB Build Script Avg Time Trend

targets.target: MATCH(n:CI:JENKINS:DATA) where  n.jobName in ["API_Config_Validation_DEV", "API_Config_Validation_QA", "API_Config_Validation_STAGE"]  AND tofloat(n.inSightsTime)>=?START_TIME? AND tofloat(n.inSightsTime)<=?END_TIME? return ceil(avg(toInt(n.duration/1000))) as AvgTime

match(m:CI:JENKINS:DATA) where m.jobName IN ["API_Config_Validation_DEV", "API_Config_Validation_QA", "API_Config_Validation_STAGE"] AND (tofloat(m.inSightsTime)>=?START_TIME? AND tofloat(m.inSightsTime)<=?END_TIME?)
with m,
CASE WHEN m.jobName="API_Config_Validation_DEV"
THEN m.duration ELSE 0 END as API_Config_Validation_DEV,
CASE 
WHEN m.jobName="API_Config_Validation_QA"
THEN m.duration ELSE 0 END as API_Config_Validation_QA,
CASE 
WHEN m.jobName="API_Config_Validation_STAGE"
THEN m.duration ELSE 0 END as API_Config_Validation_STAGE
return split(m.inSightsTimeX,'T')[0] as inSightsTime,ceil(avg(toInt(API_Config_Validation_DEV/1000))) as API_Config_Validation_DEV,ceil(avg(toInt(API_Config_Validation_QA/1000))) as API_Config_Validation_QA,ceil(avg(toInt(API_Config_Validation_STAGE/1000))) as API_Config_Validation_STAGE

panels.title: API Pre Build Avg Time Trend

targets.target: match(n:CI:JENKINS:DATA)  where n.inSightsTime>(timestamp()/1000)-1*86400 AND n.jobName IN ["Build_Deploy_PCF_Dev", "Build_Deploy_PCF_QA", "API_Build_Deploy_PCF_QA" ,"Build_Deploy_PCF_Stage"]   return count(distinct n.buildUrl) as Last24Hrs

match(n:CI:JENKINS:DATA)  where n.inSightsTime>(timestamp()/1000)-7*86400 AND n.jobName IN ["Build_Deploy_PCF_Dev", "Build_Deploy_PCF_QA", "API_Build_Deploy_PCF_QA" ,"Build_Deploy_PCF_Stage"]   return count(distinct n.buildUrl) as Last7Days

match(n:CI:JENKINS:DATA)  where n.inSightsTime>(timestamp()/1000)-30*86400 AND n.jobName IN ["Build_Deploy_PCF_Dev", "Build_Deploy_PCF_QA", "API_Build_Deploy_PCF_QA" ,"Build_Deploy_PCF_Stage"]   return count(distinct n.buildUrl) as Last30Days

match(m:CI:JENKINS:DATA) where exists(m.result) AND m.jobName IN [
"Build_Deploy_PCF_Dev", "Build_Deploy_PCF_QA", "API_Build_Deploy_PCF_QA" ,"Build_Deploy_PCF_Stage"] AND (m.result="FAILURE" OR m.result="UNSTABLE")  return count(m) as Failed

MATCH(n:CI:JENKINS:DATA) where  n.buildUrl contains "Agency_Gateway_API" AND n.jobName in ["Dest_Branch_Backup", "Force_Merge_Dest_Branches"] AND (tofloat(n.inSightsTime)>=?START_TIME? AND tofloat(n.inSightsTime)<=?END_TIME?) return ceil(avg(toInt(n.duration/1000))) as AvgTime

match(m:CI:JENKINS:DATA) where  m.buildUrl contains "Agency_Gateway_API" AND m.jobName in ["Dest_Branch_Backup", "Force_Merge_Dest_Branches"] AND (tofloat(m.inSightsTime)>=?START_TIME? AND tofloat(m.inSightsTime)<=?END_TIME?)
with m,
CASE WHEN m.jobName="Dest_Branch_Backup"
THEN m.duration ELSE 0 END as Dest_Branch_Backup,
CASE 
WHEN m.jobName="Force_Merge_Dest_Branches"
THEN m.duration ELSE 0 END as Force_Merge_Dest_Branches
return split(m.inSightsTimeX,'T')[0] as inSightsTime,ceil(avg(toInt(Dest_Branch_Backup/1000))) as Dest_Branch_Backup,ceil(avg(toInt(Force_Merge_Dest_Branches/1000))) as Force_Merge_Dest_Branches order by inSightsTime

MATCH(n:CI:JENKINS:DATA) where n.jobName in ["Build_Deploy_PCF_Dev", "API_Build_Deploy_PCF_QA", "Build_Deploy_PCF_QA", "Build_Deploy_PCF_Stage"] AND  tofloat(n.inSightsTime)>=?START_TIME? AND tofloat(n.inSightsTime)<=?END_TIME? return ceil(avg(toInt(n.duration/1000))) as AvgTime

match(m:CI:JENKINS:DATA) where m.jobName IN ["Build_Deploy_PCF_Dev", "API_Build_Deploy_PCF_QA", "Build_Deploy_PCF_QA", "Build_Deploy_PCF_Stage"] AND (tofloat(m.inSightsTime)>=?START_TIME? AND tofloat(m.inSightsTime)<=?END_TIME?)
with m,
CASE WHEN m.jobName="Build_Deploy_PCF_Dev"
THEN m.duration ELSE 0 END as Build_Deploy_PCF_Dev,
CASE 
WHEN m.jobName="API_Build_Deploy_PCF_QA"
THEN m.duration ELSE 0 END as API_Build_Deploy_PCF_QA,
CASE 
WHEN m.jobName="Build_Deploy_PCF_QA"
THEN m.duration ELSE 0 END as Build_Deploy_PCF_QA,
CASE 
WHEN m.jobName="Build_Deploy_PCF_Stage"
THEN m.duration ELSE 0 END as Build_Deploy_PCF_Stage
return split(m.inSightsTimeX,'T')[0] as inSightsTime,ceil(avg(toInt(Build_Deploy_PCF_Dev/1000))) as Build_Deploy_PCF_Dev,ceil(avg(toInt(API_Build_Deploy_PCF_QA/1000))) as API_Build_Deploy_PCF_QA,ceil(avg(toInt(Build_Deploy_PCF_QA/1000))) as Build_Deploy_PCF_QA,ceil(avg(toInt(Build_Deploy_PCF_Stage/1000))) as Build_Deploy_PCF_Stage order by inSightsTime

match(n:CI:JENKINS:DATA {result:"SUCCESS"}) where n.jobName IN ["Post_Deploy_SanityCheck_Dev", "API_Post_Deploy_SanityCheck_QA", "Post_Deploy_SanityCheck_QA", "API_Post_Deploy_SanityCheck_Stage"] AND (tofloat(n.inSightsTime)>=?START_TIME? AND tofloat(n.inSightsTime)<=?END_TIME?)  with count(n.result) as success OPTIONAL match(m:CI:JENKINS:DATA) where exists(m.result) AND m.jobName IN [
"Post_Deploy_SanityCheck_Dev", "API_Post_Deploy_SanityCheck_QA", "Post_Deploy_SanityCheck_QA", "API_Post_Deploy_SanityCheck_Stage"] AND (tofloat(m.inSightsTime)>=?START_TIME? AND tofloat(m.inSightsTime)<=?END_TIME?)  return round(tofloat(success*100)/count(m)) as percent

match(m:CI:JENKINS:DATA) where m.jobName IN ["Post_Deploy_SanityCheck_Dev", "API_Post_Deploy_SanityCheck_QA", "Post_Deploy_SanityCheck_QA", "API_Post_Deploy_SanityCheck_Stage"] AND (tofloat(m.inSightsTime)>=?START_TIME? AND tofloat(m.inSightsTime)<=?END_TIME?)
with m,
CASE WHEN m.jobName="Post_Deploy_SanityCheck_Dev"
THEN m.duration ELSE 0 END as Post_Deploy_SanityCheck_Dev,
CASE 
WHEN m.jobName="API_Post_Deploy_SanityCheck_QA"
THEN m.duration ELSE 0 END as API_Post_Deploy_SanityCheck_QA,
CASE 
WHEN m.jobName="Post_Deploy_SanityCheck_QA"
THEN m.duration ELSE 0 END as Post_Deploy_SanityCheck_QA,
CASE 
WHEN m.jobName="API_Post_Deploy_SanityCheck_Stage"
THEN m.duration ELSE 0 END as API_Post_Deploy_SanityCheck_Stage
return split(m.inSightsTimeX,'T')[0] as inSightsTime,ceil(avg(toInt(Post_Deploy_SanityCheck_Dev/1000))) as Post_Deploy_SanityCheck_Dev,ceil(avg(toInt(API_Post_Deploy_SanityCheck_QA/1000))) as API_Post_Deploy_SanityCheck_QA,ceil(avg(toInt(Post_Deploy_SanityCheck_QA/1000))) as Post_Deploy_SanityCheck_QA,ceil(avg(toInt(API_Post_Deploy_SanityCheck_Stage/1000))) as API_Post_Deploy_SanityCheck_Stage order by inSightsTime
